DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy and safety of oral moxifloxacin compared to oral levofloxacin plus oral metronidazole in uncomplicated pelvic inflammatory disease (PID)
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Moxifloxacin Versus Levofloxacin Plus Metronidazole In Uncomplicated Pelvic Inflammatory Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of uncomplicated PID based on the absence of pelvic or tuboovarian abscess at pelvic ultrasound and/or laparoscopic examination. Subjects with impaired liver and renal function; known hypersensitivity to study drugs, related compounds or any of the excipients.
